mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_watch ( user_number, heart_rate, occurred_at ) VALUES ( #{userNumber}, CAST(#{heartRate} AS INTEGER), CAST(#{occurredAt} AS TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE) )
INSERT INTO tb_task (manager_number, user_number, task_processed) VALUES (#{managerNumber}, #{userNumber}, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT u.user_name AS managerName, u.mobile AS mobile, u.email AS email FROM tb_manager m JOIN tb_user u ON u.user_number = m.manager_number WHERE m.manager_number = #{managerNumber} LIMIT 1
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_user u SET user_name = COALESCE(#{managerName}, u.user_name), mobile = COALESCE(#{mobile}, u.mobile), email = COALESCE(#{email}, u.email) FROM tb_manager m WHERE u.user_number = m.manager_number AND m.manager_number = #{managerNumber}
mapper.select: SELECT t.task_number AS taskNumber, t.task_processed AS taskProcessed, w.occurred_at AS occurredAt, u.birth_date AS birthDate, u.gender AS gender FROM tb_task t JOIN tb_watch w ON w.user_number = t.user_number JOIN tb_user u ON u.user_number = w.user_number JOIN tb_manager m ON m.manager_number = t.manager_number WHERE m.manager_number = #{managerNumber} ORDER BY w.occurred_at DESC

SELECT t.task_number AS taskNumber, t.task_processed AS taskProcessed, ST_X(u.location::geometry) AS userLon, ST_Y(u.location::geometry) AS userLat, u.birth_date AS birthDate, u.gender AS gender, w.occurred_at AS occurredAt, w.heart_rate AS heartRate FROM tb_task t JOIN tb_watch w ON w.user_number = t.user_number JOIN tb_user u ON u.user_number = w.user_number WHERE t.task_number = #{taskNumber} LIMIT 1

SELECT t.task_number AS id, t.task_processed AS taskProcessed, w.occurred_at AS dateAndTime, u.birth_date AS birthDateForAge, u.gender AS gender, -- user 테이블 위치 ST_X(u.location::geometry) AS userLon, ST_Y(u.location::geometry) AS userLat, -- watch 위치 ST_X(w.watch_location::geometry) AS watchLon, ST_Y(w.watch_location::geometry) AS watchLat, w.heart_rate AS hr, w.watch_count AS count, m.manager_number AS managerNumber FROM tb_task t JOIN tb_manager m ON m.manager_number = t.manager_number JOIN tb_control_tower c ON c.control_tower_number = m.control_tower_number JOIN tb_user u ON u.user_number = t.user_number JOIN ( SELECT user_number, occurred_at, heart_rate, watch_location, watch_count FROM ( SELECT user_number, occurred_at, heart_rate, watch_location, COUNT(*) OVER (PARTITION BY user_number) AS watch_count, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY user_number ORDER BY occurred_at DESC) AS rn FROM tb_watch ) w1 WHERE w1.rn = 1 ) w ON w.user_number = t.user_number WHERE c.control_tower_number = #{controlTowerNumber} ORDER BY w.occurred_at DESC
